color.description: Applies a color to the navigation dots - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将颜色应用于导航点 - 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

cycle.description: Determines whether the carousel should cycle through the image.
cycle.description_zh: 确定轮播是否应该循环显示图像。

delimiter-icon.description_zh: 设置轮播分隔符的图标。

direction.description: The transition direction when changing windows.
direction.description_zh: 更改窗口时的过渡方向。

disabled.description: Remove the component's click or target functionality.
disabled.description_zh: 移除组件的单击或 target 功能。

height.description: Sets the height of the component.

hide-delimiter-background.description: Hides the background of the bottom separator.
hide-delimiter-background.description_zh: 隐藏底部分隔符的背景。

hide-delimiters.description: Hides the bottom separator of the carousel.
hide-delimiters.description_zh: 隐藏轮播的底部分隔符。

interval.description: The duration between carousel image cycles. The cycle attribute is required.
interval.description_zh: 轮播图像周期之间的持续时间。需要 cycle 属性。

mandatory.description: Force at least one item to be selected, if available.
mandatory.description_zh: 强制至少选择一个项目（如果可用）。

:v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array.
:v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v 模型值。如果组件支持 multiple 属性，则默认为空数组。

next-icon.description: An icon that appears to force the next item to be pagination.
next-icon.description_zh: 强制对下一项分页而显示的图标。

prev-icon.description: An icon that is displayed to force pagination of the previous item.
prev-icon.description_zh: 强制对前一项分页而显示的图标。

progress.description: Displays a carousel progress bar. The cycle and interval attributes are required.
progress.description_zh: 显示轮播进度条。需要 cycle 和 interval 属性。

reverse.description: Reverses the normal direction of the transition.

selected-class.description: Configure the name of the CSS class that will be applied when the selected item is selected.
selected-class.description_zh: 配置被选中项目时应用的 CSS 类名。

show-arrows.description: Displays the Next/Previous arrow for navigation.
show-arrows.description_zh: 显示 下一个/前一个 导航的箭头。

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

touch.description: Custom left and right functions are provided when swiping left and right.
touch.description_zh: 左右滑动时提供自定义的 left 和 right 函数。

vertical-delimiters.description: Displays the separator of the carousel vertically.
vertical-delimiters.description_zh: 垂直显示轮播的分隔符。
